name: Master Baiter
description:
Take part in a fishing competition by driving around, using your radar, and snatching up all the fish you can before they can get away... or get caught by your competitors.

Instruction manual: https://imgur.com/a/ZS1mA97

Complete with hand drawn assets, stock sounds, and royalty free music, this is my first game, made in under a month for a school project.
